TestCase.name: testEventTimeTemporalJoin
TestCase.Resource: SELECT o_amount * rate as rate FROM Orders AS o JOIN RatesHistoryWithPK FOR SYSTEM_TIME AS OF o.o_rowtime as r on o.o_currency = r.currency

LogicalProject(rate=[*($0, $5)]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{1, 2}]) :- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[o_rowtime], watermark=[$2]) : +- LogicalProject(o_amount=[$0], o_currency=[$1], o_rowtime=[$2], o_proctime=[PROCTIME()]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Orders, source: [CollectionTableSource(o_amount, o_currency, o_rowtime)]]]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($cor0.o_currency, $0)]) +- LogicalSnapshot(period=[$cor0.o_rowtime]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rowtime], watermark=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, RatesHistoryWithPK, source: [CollectionTableSource(currency, rate, rowtime)]]])

Calc(select=[*(o_amount, rate) AS rate]) +- TemporalJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[AND(=(o_currency, currency), __TEMPORAL_JOIN_CONDITION(o_rowtime, rowtime, __TEMPORAL_JOIN_LEFT_KEY(o_currency), TEMPORAL_JOIN_RIGHT_KEY(currency), __TEMPORAL_JOIN_CONDITION_PRIMARY_KEY(currency)))], select=[o_amount, o_currency, o_rowtime, currency, rate, rowtime]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[o_currency]]) : +- Calc(select=[o_amount, o_currency, o_rowtime]) : +- WatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[o_rowtime], watermark=[o_rowtime]) : +- Calc(select=[o_amount, o_currency, o_rowtime, PROCTIME() AS o_proctime]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Orders, source: [CollectionTableSource(o_amount, o_currency, o_rowtime)]]], fields=[o_amount, o_currency, o_rowtime]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[currency]]) +- WatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rowtime], watermark=[rowtime]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, RatesHistoryWithPK, source: [CollectionTableSource(currency, rate, rowtime)]]], fields=[currency, rate, rowtime])

TestCase.name: testEventTimeTemporalJoinWithView
TestCase.Resource: SELECT o_amount * rate as rate FROM Orders AS o JOIN DeduplicatedView FOR SYSTEM_TIME AS OF o.o_rowtime as r1 on o.o_currency = r1.currency

LogicalProject(rate=[*($0, $5)]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{1, 2}]) :- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[o_rowtime], watermark=[$2]) : +- LogicalProject(o_amount=[$0], o_currency=[$1], o_rowtime=[$2], o_proctime=[PROCTIME()]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Orders, source: [CollectionTableSource(o_amount, o_currency, o_rowtime)]]]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($cor0.o_currency, $0)]) +- LogicalSnapshot(period=[$cor0.o_rowtime]) +- LogicalProject(currency=[$0], rate=[$1], rowtime=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($3, 1)]) +- LogicalProject(currency=[$0], rate=[$1], rowtime=[$2], rowNum=[ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY $0 ORDER BY $2 DESC NULLS LAST ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW)]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rowtime], watermark=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, RatesHistory, source: [CollectionTableSource(currency, rate, rowtime)]]])

Calc(select=[*(o_amount, rate) AS rate]) +- TemporalJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[AND(=(o_currency, currency), __TEMPORAL_JOIN_CONDITION(o_rowtime, rowtime, __TEMPORAL_JOIN_LEFT_KEY(o_currency), TEMPORAL_JOIN_RIGHT_KEY(currency), __TEMPORAL_JOIN_CONDITION_PRIMARY_KEY(currency)))], select=[o_amount, o_currency, o_rowtime, currency, rate, rowtime]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[o_currency]]) : +- Calc(select=[o_amount, o_currency, o_rowtime]) : +- WatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[o_rowtime], watermark=[o_rowtime]) : +- Calc(select=[o_amount, o_currency, o_rowtime, PROCTIME() AS o_proctime]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Orders, source: [CollectionTableSource(o_amount, o_currency, o_rowtime)]]], fields=[o_amount, o_currency, o_rowtime]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[currency]]) +- Rank(strategy=[AppendFastStrategy], rankType=[ROW_NUMBER], rankRange=[rankStart=1, rankEnd=1], partitionBy=[currency], orderBy=[rowtime DESC], select=[currency, rate, rowtime]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[currency]]) +- WatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rowtime], watermark=[rowtime]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, RatesHistory, source: [CollectionTableSource(currency, rate, rowtime)]]], fields=[currency, rate, rowtime])

TestCase.name: testProcTimeTemporalJoin
TestCase.Resource: SELECT o_amount * rate as rate FROM Orders AS o JOIN latestView FOR SYSTEM_TIME AS OF o.o_proctime as r1 on o.o_currency = r1.currency

LogicalProject(rate=[*($0, $5)]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{1, 3}]) :- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[o_rowtime], watermark=[$2]) : +- LogicalProject(o_amount=[$0], o_currency=[$1], o_rowtime=[$2], o_proctime=[PROCTIME()]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Orders, source: [CollectionTableSource(o_amount, o_currency, o_rowtime)]]]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($cor0.o_currency, $0)]) +- LogicalSnapshot(period=[$cor0.o_proctime]) +- LogicalProject(currency=[$0], rate=[$1], proctime=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($3, 1)]) +- LogicalProject(currency=[$0], rate=[$1], proctime=[PROCTIME()], rowNum=[ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY $0 ORDER BY PROCTIME() DESC NULLS LAST ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, RatesOnly, source: [CollectionTableSource(currency, rate)]]])

Calc(select=[*(o_amount, rate) AS rate]) +- TemporalJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[AND(=(o_currency, currency), __TEMPORAL_JOIN_CONDITION(o_proctime, __TEMPORAL_JOIN_LEFT_KEY(o_currency), TEMPORAL_JOIN_RIGHT_KEY(currency)))], select=[o_amount, o_currency, o_proctime, currency, rate]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[o_currency]]) : +- Calc(select=[o_amount, o_currency, o_proctime]) : +- WatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[o_rowtime], watermark=[o_rowtime]) : +- Calc(select=[o_amount, o_currency, o_rowtime, PROCTIME() AS o_proctime]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Orders, source: [CollectionTableSource(o_amount, o_currency, o_rowtime)]]], fields=[o_amount, o_currency, o_rowtime]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[currency]]) +- Calc(select=[currency, rate]) +- Deduplicate(keep=[LastRow], key=[currency], order=[PROCTIME]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[currency]]) +- Calc(select=[currency, rate, PROCTIME() AS $2]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, RatesOnly, source: [CollectionTableSource(currency, rate)]]], fields=[currency, rate])

TestCase.name: testProcTimeTemporalJoinWithView
TestCase.Resource: SELECT o_amount * rate as rate FROM Orders AS o JOIN latest_rates FOR SYSTEM_TIME AS OF o.o_proctime as r1 on o.o_currency = r1.currency

LogicalProject(rate=[*($0, $5)]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{1, 3}]) :- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[o_rowtime], watermark=[$2]) : +- LogicalProject(o_amount=[$0], o_currency=[$1], o_rowtime=[$2], o_proctime=[PROCTIME()]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Orders, source: [CollectionTableSource(o_amount, o_currency, o_rowtime)]]]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($cor0.o_currency, $0)]) +- LogicalSnapshot(period=[$cor0.o_proctime]) +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{0}], rate=[LAST_VALUE($1)]) +- LogicalProject(currency=[$0], rate=[$1]) +- LogicalWatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rowtime], watermark=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, RatesHistory, source: [CollectionTableSource(currency, rate, rowtime)]]])

Calc(select=[*(o_amount, rate) AS rate]) +- TemporalJoin(joinType=[InnerJoin], where=[AND(=(o_currency, currency), __TEMPORAL_JOIN_CONDITION(o_proctime, __TEMPORAL_JOIN_LEFT_KEY(o_currency), TEMPORAL_JOIN_RIGHT_KEY(currency)))], select=[o_amount, o_currency, o_proctime, currency, rate]) :- Exchange(distribution=[hash[o_currency]]) : +- Calc(select=[o_amount, o_currency, o_proctime]) : +- WatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[o_rowtime], watermark=[o_rowtime]) : +- Calc(select=[o_amount, o_currency, o_rowtime, PROCTIME() AS o_proctime]) : +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, Orders, source: [CollectionTableSource(o_amount, o_currency, o_rowtime)]]], fields=[o_amount, o_currency, o_rowtime]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[currency]]) +- GroupAggregate(groupBy=[currency], select=[currency, LAST_VALUE(rate) AS rate]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[currency]]) +- Calc(select=[currency, rate]) +- WatermarkAssigner(rowtime=[rowtime], watermark=[rowtime]) +- LegacyTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, RatesHistory, source: [CollectionTableSource(currency, rate, rowtime)]]], fields=[currency, rate, rowtime])
